parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.38

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns a list of all controls for desired existing display. Returned controls also include controls from [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]]s.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[allControls]] display

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display: [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Control]]s

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[allControls]] controlsGroup (<template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03</value></part></template>)

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> controlsGroup: [[Control]] - [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Control]]s

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allCtrls = [[allControls]] [[findDisplay]] 46;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_allSubCtrls = [[allControls]] _myControlsGroup;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allDisplays]], [[controlsGroupCtrl]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[allVariables]], [[allCurators]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[allDeadMen]]
</value></part></template></root>
